title: HouseOfBAMF
author: HouseOfBAMF
content: .999 1oz silver United crypto states. New in box  funded with 0.00001 bitcoin.Hologram on the back of coin for redemption using a QR code. This  is my first listing on bitcointalk.org so it’s a giveaway. You will just need to practice a transaction with me so I can learn about crypto and interactions on this forum a bit more. I’m only allowed 2 private messages a day so please provide the following in PM.-Mailing address. -btc addressI will send you a very small amount of bitcoin and would like for you to send it back just so I can see how this all works. Only full member level and above will qualify.Free shipping, free coin. Rules;Only full member level and above count as postings. the winner will be the 7th full member or above to post. Good luck!

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: First off, welcome to the forum. Second, If your post is genuine then thanks for trying to kick it off with a giveaway.  Third, NO ONE will send you any of that information without first proving yourself with months, if not years of participation. Often any newbie would be subject to using a escrow account for any transaction. If you truly do want to practice sending and receiving BTC I would encourage you to find a different outlet for that. I suggest you continue posting and learning the ways of the forum. This process takes time to earn trust. Overall just try and be less creepy and suspicious. Other than that welcome to forum.

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: Thanks! I’ll take notes on the constructive criticism. I’ve had interactions with people on here already and everyone has been very helpful and great. I’ve watched your YouTube before. I like the videos! I’m just trying thing out on here and trying to learn in a positive way. Your post counts as number 1 I just need 6 more and that will be the winner of the coin… providing they share a mailing address like you stated.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Is an escrow address acceptable? Yes it is a great community here and your early enough where you can still get your hands on the greatest collectables the earth has ever seen. good luck

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: It’s your choice where you want it mailed to. You can have it sent to a P.O. Box or some escrow dealer I just need a address to mail it out. That counts as number 2 just 5 more before it’s yours! Haha

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: It is a nice offering of a coin - I found them too expensive to personally buy one but I did like the way they looked even if not the way they chose to load it or the denomination they chose.

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: Mopar that’s post 3! Check your e mail I tan out of pm

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: HouseOfBAMF on October 20, 2022, 02:45:06 AMMopar that’s post 3! Check your e mail I tan out of pm thank you, yes I got your email. one question - you state you want to send funds to someone and then to have them send back so as to "see how it all works" what are you trying to see? how to send pymts/receive pymts? are you talking using on-chain BTC or LN ?Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on October 20, 2022, 02:27:44 AMIs an escrow address acceptable? Yes it is a great community here and your early enough where you can still get your hands on the greatest collectables the earth has ever seen. good luckto address cryptogreatdanes pointit could always be sent to one of the escrows/reshippers here as well.

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: The proper formalities of buying with btc. Recently I learned where to find the tx# when I send a transaction. I want to see what it looks like when some one sends it to me.I think all the people  with full level member and above have paid their dues to get that ranking… I’m just paying my dues in silver that has a little bit of bitcoin in it to learn a little more. Mopar that’s post 4

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: HouseOfBAMF on October 20, 2022, 03:03:09 AMThe proper formalities of buying with btc. Recently I learned where to find the tx# when I send a transaction. I want to see what it looks like when some one sends it to me.I think all the people  with full level member and above have paid their dues to get that ranking… I’m just paying my dues in silver that has a little bit of bitcoin in it to learn a little more. Mopar that’s post 4odd way to do so. are you using a hw wallet or an exchange account? if an exchange account good luck at properly tracking that. Also, if an exchange account, I would recommend getting it off and using a cold storage wallet for majority of funds and a hw hot wallet (properly backed up) for usable funds.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Also, if you want to try the lightning network (Strike) if you use a referral, I think you get $5 for free and the person who referred you gets $5 as well.   If you want to use my referral, I will send you back $2.50 to demo how it works, this gets you $7.50 for free (which you can convert to BTC).I have done this approach with a lot of people locally, as I love Jack Maller's enthusiasm.https://strike.me/PM me if you want my referral link, as stated, I would gladly give you 1/2 of my referral back as a demo.Welcome to the forum.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Markzellers on October 20, 2022, 03:24:53 AMAlso, if you want to try the lightning network (Strike) if you use a referral, I think you get $5 for free and the person who referred you gets $5 as well.   If you want to use my referral, I will send you back $2.50 to demo how it works, this gets you $7.50 for free (which you can convert to BTC).I have done this approach with a lot of people locally, as I love Jack Maller's enthusiasm.https://strike.me/PM me if you want my referral link, as stated, I would gladly give you 1/2 of my referral back as a demo.Welcome to the forum.strike is great as it allows for FIAT/BTC and LN payments.

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: Post 5 I diversified my storages. But I would be sending from a exchange… just a small ammount, then I want you to return it so I can see what the tx; looks like… I suppose I could see the same thing when I transfer funds between my own accounts but I’m learning about that and like I said I’m paying for someone’s  knowledge.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: HouseOfBAMF on October 20, 2022, 03:27:04 AMPost 5 I diversified my storages. But I would be sending from a exchange… just a small ammount, then I want you to return it so I can see what the tx; looks like… I suppose I could see the same thing when I transfer funds between my own accounts but I’m learning about that and like I said I’m paying for someone’s  knowledge.gotcha most exchanges wont actually have a "wallet" for each user, the funds just dump into their hot wallet and somewhere a ledger is updated to shows who has what balance.

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: Closed! MoparMiningLLC wins! Markzellers! Thanks for the info I’m going to check that out.CryptoGreatDane; I appreciate your informative videos and contribution to the community I heard about you before this forum.MoparMiningLLC: I’ll mail out tomorrow, if the pm from earlier is still good. I can provide tracking in e mail or pm or not at all just let me know the process you prefer and I’ll get this out promptly. I’ll e mail you shortly. Thanks!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: yes that is fine. thank you.glad to have another collector here on the forums.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Welcome BAMF. Best years still to come

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Hello!!Glad to have another collector here
